body_html:
It seems to be kinda related, as far as I understand that issue, the problem is that two versions of tensorflow outputs different matrices in same conditions. I haven't tried to draw the output, but I think they are pretty different in a visual way too.
In my case the output is changing from run to run, like some information is random and/or stored between the runs.

I've written above that I've tried different recent version of MacOS, Tensorflow and Python as well.

body:
It seems to be kinda related, as far as I understand that issue, the problem is that two versions of tensorflow outputs different matrices in same conditions. I haven't tried to draw the output, but I think they are pretty different in a visual way too. 
In my case the output is changing from run to run, like some information is random and/or stored between the runs.

I've written above that I've tried different recent version of MacOS, Tensorflow and Python as well.
